    Creates a ChangeVehicleLayout trigger action to assign a layout (=set of textures) to the given traffic vehicle (or steering car if not set).

    Creates a GetTimeUntilBrake trigger action by parsing the given node list.
    TriggerAction InteractionMethods.measureTimeUntilSpeedChange​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
    Creates a GetTimeUntilSpeedChange trigger action by parsing the given node list.
    TriggerAction InteractionMethods.moveTraffic​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
    Creates a MoveTraffic trigger action list by parsing the node list for the name of the traffic object to move and the ID of the target way point.
    TriggerAction InteractionMethods.openInstructionsScreen​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
    Shows up a screen with instructions
    TriggerAction InteractionMethods.pauseSimulation​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)  
    TriggerAction InteractionMethods.pauseSound​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
    Pauses the given sound file.
    TriggerAction InteractionMethods.playMovie​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
    Plays the given movie file.
    TriggerAction InteractionMethods.playNextMovie​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
    Plays the next movie file.
    TriggerAction InteractionMethods.playSound​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
    Plays the given sound file.
    TriggerAction InteractionMethods.reportSpeed​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
    Writes an entry to the log if given speed exceeded or undershot, resp.
    TriggerAction InteractionMethods.reportText​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
    Writes a custom entry to the log
    TriggerAction InteractionMethods.reportTrafficLight​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
    Writes an entry to the log if given traffic light is in the given state.
    TriggerAction InteractionMethods.requestGreenTrafficLight​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
    Requests the given traffic light to turn green.
    TriggerAction InteractionMethods.resetCar​(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int repeat, java.util.Properties parameterList)
    Creates a ResetCar trigger action by parsing the node list for the name of the reset point to place the car when the trigger was hit.
